Corner Unit

Critical component in fall protection systems, allowing the lifeline to navigate corners and maintain continuous safety

Premium Quality
Smart Design

This lifeline corner unit is a critical component in fall protection systems, allowing the lifeline to navigate corners and maintain continuous safety. It is typically designed to be a sub-assembly with corner anchors, mounting brackets, bolts, locknuts, and a corner tube. This Corner unit specially designed to ensuring workers can move smoothly and safely around corners.

Standard: EN 795 : 2012
Material: AISI 304 / 304L / 316
Allowable Working Load: 12 kN
Breaking Strength: 25 kN
Component Code: HHLC-06
Talk to a Safety Expert

Key Features

Continuous Safety
EN 795:2012
Corner Navigation
Smooth transitions
Sub-Assembly
Complete system
Durable
Weather resistant
